verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sunrise,<s%> <S%H4217><s%> from the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and all the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H4217>eastward:<s%>

<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> which is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> even to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth,<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> and to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> even the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to Beth <S%H1020>Jeshimoth;<s%> and on the <S%H8486>south,<s%> under the slopes of <S%H798>Pisgah:<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and at <S%H154>Edrei,<s%>

and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and in <S%H5548>Salecah,<s%> and in all <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maacathites,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4872>them.<s%> Moses the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half-tribe<s%> <S%H7626><s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

These are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> whom <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> from Baal <S%H1171>Gad<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak,<s%> that goes <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir.<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions;<s%>

in the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and in the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> and in the <S%H794>slopes,<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and in the <S%H5045>South;<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite:<s%>
the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> which is <S%H6654>beside<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%>
the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> in the <S%H5299>height<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%>
